Contact Us

Alcanza Ship Services has 30 years of experience in ship supply and spare parts. We provide new-built stores to shipyards and technical stores to ports and the offshore oil & gas sector. Recently, we expanded to supply cruise liners, prioritizing the health and safety of seafarers on all vessels we serve.
